welcome_message_body: Welcome to Providence! Get ready to be charmed by the city's historic architecture, vibrant arts scene, and delicious culinary offerings. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Providence has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: The Crêpery
restaurants.description: The Crêpery is a breakfast spot located in Logan.

restaurants.description: Elements Restaurant is a american restaurant located in Logan.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Terminal E is a newly constructed terminal at T. F. Green Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Central Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at State Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at State Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Bedford Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.
